title: Did OCE Forums just shut down? o_O
body:
o_O

I can't post anything at all.....is this the downfall of our community?

replies.body: Indeed it is friend. The last post you made on the forums will be the last ever by the looks of it. It's a shame how a large percentage of the community is leaving. It won't be the same anymore...

> Indeed it is friend. The last post you made on the forums will be the last ever by the looks of it. **It's a shame how a large percentage of the community is leaving**. It won't be the same anymore...

define large percentage? where is this "large percentage" going?

> > Indeed it is friend. The last post you made on the forums will be the last ever by the looks of it. **It's a shame how a large percentage of the community is leaving**. It won't be the same anymore...
> 
> define large percentage? where is this "large percentage" going?

I'd suggest that since they have made it a crappier version of Reddit but with a massively smaller user base, most of those users will either stop using all together; or the more likely option just go to Reddit. 

I used to go to GD every day, now I barely come once or twice a week. I'm only one example, but it's easy to understand how a lot of others would feel as well.

I still check here daily now, but I'm forced to do so...I'd much prefer our beloved GD...

{{item:3031}} {{champion:157}} {{item:3087}}
What? Can you not read or something? There is a massive banner at the very top of the forums. Does anyone know if the FEK team are going to do something with boards? So much potential.

omg Sackboy confirmed it...OCE Forums has officially been closed......

Why is Riot forcing this down our throats...

 *--Bring Back GD*
why can we not have both?
Well, I guess this is the last time I use forums/boards. Was fun boys.

Dayum, I was there since OCE started...

If only boards was a forum and not point based like le Reddit. Thanks Riot for nothing.
